Table.sql: select case when g.maicd like 'A91%' then '01' else case when g.maicd='A83.0' then '02' else case when g.maicd='A86' or g.maicd like 'A87%' or g.maicd like 'G04%' then '03' else case when g.maicd like 'B05%' then '04' else case when g.maicd like 'B50%' or g.maicd like 'B51%' or g.maicd like 'B54%' or g.maicd like 'B52%' then '05' else case when g.maicd like 'B34%' then '06' else case when g.maicd like 'J%' then '07' else case when g.maicd like 'B26%' then '08' else case when g.maicd like 'A36%' then '09' else case when g.maicd like 'A37%' then '10' else case when g.maicd like 'B01%' then '11' else '12' end end end end end end end end end end end stt,a.MABN, a.HOTEN,substr(i.tuoivao,1,3)||case when substr(i.tuoivao,4,1)=0 then 'TU' else case when substr(i.tuoivao,4,1)=1 then 'TH' else case when substr(i.tuoivao,4,1)=2 then 'NG' else 'GI' end end end as tuoi,nvl(h.quanhe,' ') quanhe,nvl(h.hoten,' ') hotenqh,nvl(a.SONHA,' ') sonha, nvl(a.THON,' ') thon, b.TENPXA, c.TENQUAN, d.TENTT,nvl(y.tenbv,' ') tenbv, to_char(g.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi') ngayvk,g.CHANDOAN, g.MAICD,' ' ttlucrk,' ' ngayrk,' ' SOLUUTRU,' ' nhom,' ' tennhom from his.btdbn a inner join hismmyy.benhanpk g on a.mabn=g.mabn inner join his.btdpxa b on a.maphuongxa=b.maphuongxa inner join his.btdquan c on a.maqu=c.maqu inner join his.btdtt d on a.matt=d.matt left join hismmyy.quanhe h on g.maql=h.maql left join hismmyy.lienhe i on g.maql=i.maql left join hismmyy.noigioithieu x on g.maql=x.maql left join his.dstt y on x.mabv=y.mabv where g.maql>0
Table.cont: (g.maicd like 'A91%' or g.maicd='A83.0' or g.maicd='A86' or g.maicd like 'A87%' or g.maicd like 'G04%' or g.maicd like 'B05%' or g.maicd like 'B50%' or g.maicd like 'B51%' or g.maicd like 'B54%' or g.maicd like 'B52%' or g.maicd like 'B34%' or g.maicd like 'J%' or g.maicd like 'B26%' or g.maicd like 'A36%' or g.maicd like 'A37%' or g.maicd like 'B01%')

Table.sql: select case when g.maicdrv like 'A91%' then '01' else case when g.maicdrv='A83.0' then '02' else case when g.maicdrv='A86' or g.maicdrv like 'A87%' or g.maicdrv like 'G04%' then '03' else case when g.maicdrv like 'B05%' then '04' else case when g.maicdrv like 'B50%' or g.maicdrv like 'B51%' or g.maicdrv like 'B54%' or g.maicdrv like 'B52%' then '05' else case when g.maicdrv like 'B34%' then '06' else case when g.maicdrv like 'J%' then '07' else case when g.maicdrv like 'B26%' then '08' else case when g.maicdrv like 'A36%' then '09' else case when g.maicdrv like 'A37%' then '10' else case when g.maicdrv like 'B01%' then '11' else '12' end end end end end end end end end end end stt,a.MABN, a.HOTEN,substr(i.tuoivao,1,3)||case when substr(i.tuoivao,4,1)=0 then 'TU' else case when substr(i.tuoivao,4,1)=1 then 'TH' else case when substr(i.tuoivao,4,1)=2 then 'NG' else 'GI' end end end as tuoi,nvl(h.quanhe,' ') quanhe,nvl(h.hoten,' ') hotenqh,nvl(a.SONHA,' ') sonha, nvl(a.THON,' ') thon, b.TENPXA, c.TENQUAN, d.TENTT,nvl(y.tenbv,' ') tenbv, to_char(g.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi') ngayvk,g.CHANDOAN, g.MAICD,to_char(q.ten) ttlucrk,to_char(g.ngayrv,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi') ngayrk,' ' SOLUUTRU,' ' nhom,' ' tennhom from his.btdbn a inner join his.benhanngtr g on a.mabn=g.mabn inner join his.btdpxa b on a.maphuongxa=b.maphuongxa inner join his.btdquan c on a.maqu=c.maqu inner join his.btdtt d on a.matt=d.matt left join his.quanhe h on g.maql=h.maql left join his.lienhe i on g.maql=i.maql left join his.noigioithieu x on g.maql=x.maql left join his.dstt y on x.mabv=y.mabv inner join his.ttxk q on g.ttlucrv=q.ma where g.maql>0

Table.sql: select case when g.maicd like 'A91%' then '01' else case when g.maicd='A83.0' then '02' else case when g.maicd='A86' or g.maicd like 'A87%' or g.maicd like 'G04%' then '03' else case when g.maicd like 'B05%' then '04' else case when g.maicd like 'B50%' or g.maicd like 'B51%' or g.maicd like 'B54%' or g.maicd like 'B52%' then '05' else case when g.maicd like 'B34%' then '06' else case when g.maicd like 'J%' then '07' else case when g.maicd like 'B26%' then '08' else case when g.maicd like 'A36%' then '09' else case when g.maicd like 'A37%' then '10' else case when g.maicd like 'B01%' then '11' else '12' end end end end end end end end end end end stt,a.MABN, a.HOTEN,substr(g.tuoivao,1,3)||case when substr(g.tuoivao,4,1)=0 then 'TU' else case when substr(g.tuoivao,4,1)=1 then 'TH' else case when substr(g.tuoivao,4,1)=2 then 'NG' else 'GI' end end end as tuoi,nvl(h.quanhe,' ') quanhe,nvl(h.hoten,' ') hotenqh,nvl(a.SONHA,' ') sonha, nvl(a.THON,' ') thon, b.TENPXA, c.TENQUAN, d.TENTT,nvl(y.tenbv,' ') tenbv,to_char(g.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi') ngayvk, g.CHANDOAN, g.MAICD,' ' ttlucrk,' ' ngayrk,' ' SOLUUTRU,' ' nhom,' ' tennhom FROM his.btdbn a inner join his.benhandt f on a.mabn=f.mabn inner join his.btdpxa b on a.maphuongxa=b.maphuongxa inner join his.btdquan c on a.maqu=c.maqu inner join his.btdtt d on a.matt=d.matt inner join his.nhapkhoa g on f.maql=g.maql left join his.QUANHE h on f.maql=h.maql left join his.noigioithieu x on f.maql=x.maql left join his.dstt y on x.mabv =y.mabv where g.maql>0

Table.sql: select case when g.maicd like 'A91%' then '01' else case when g.maicd='A83.0' then '02' else case when g.maicd='A86' or g.maicd like 'A87%' or g.maicd like 'G04%' then '03' else case when g.maicd like 'B05%' then '04' else case when g.maicd like 'B50%' or g.maicd like 'B51%' or g.maicd like 'B54%' or g.maicd like 'B52%' then '05' else case when g.maicd like 'B34%' then '06' else case when g.maicd like 'J%' then '07' else case when g.maicd like 'B26%' then '08' else case when g.maicd like 'A36%' then '09' else case when g.maicd like 'A37%' then '10' else case when g.maicd like 'B01%' then '11' else '12' end end end end end end end end end end end stt,a.MABN, a.HOTEN,substr(f.tuoivao,1,3)||case when substr(f.tuoivao,4,1)=0 then 'TU' else case when substr(f.tuoivao,4,1)=1 then 'TH' else case when substr(f.tuoivao,4,1)=2 then 'NG' else 'GI' end end end as tuoi, nvl(h.quanhe,' ') quanhe, nvl(h.hoten,' ') hotenqh, nvl(a.SONHA,' ') sonha, nvl(a.THON,' ') thon, b.TENPXA, c.TENQUAN, d.TENTT,nvl(y.tenbv,' ') tenbv,to_char(f.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi') ngayvk, g.CHANDOAN, g.MAICD, e.TEN ttlucrk, to_char(g.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi') ngayrk, ' ' SOLUUTRU,' ' nhom,' ' tennhom FROM his.btdbn a inner join his.nhapkhoa f on a.mabn=f.mabn inner join his.btdpxa b on a.maphuongxa=b.maphuongxa inner join his.btdquan c on a.maqu=c.maqu inner join his.btdtt d on a.matt=d.matt inner join his.xuatkhoa g on f.id=g.id inner join his.ttxk e on g.ttlucrk=e.ma inner join his.benhandt i on f.maql=i.maql left join his.quanhe h on i.maql=h.maql left join his.noigioithieu x on i.maql=x.maql left join his.dstt y on x.mabv=y.mabv where g.id>0
Table.cont: (g.maicd like 'A91%' or g.maicd='A83.0' or g.maicd='A86' or g.maicd like 'A87%' or g.maicd like 'G04%' or g.maicd like 'B05%' or g.maicd like 'B50%' or g.maicd like 'B51%' or g.maicd like 'B54%' or g.maicd like 'B52%' or g.maicd like 'B34%' or g.maicd like 'J%' or g.maicd like 'B26%' or g.maicd like 'A36%' or g.maicd like 'A37%' or g.maicd like 'B01%')
Table.stt: case when g.maicd like 'A91%' then '01' else case when g.maicd='A83.0' then '02' else case when g.maicd='A86' or g.maicd like 'A87%' or g.maicd like 'G04%' then '03' else case when g.maicd like 'B05%' then '04' else case when g.maicd like 'B50%' or g.maicd like 'B51%' or g.maicd like 'B54%' or g.maicd like 'B52%' then '05' else case when g.maicd like 'B34%' then '06' else case when g.maicd like 'J%' then '07' else case when g.maicd like 'B26%' then '08' else case when g.maicd like 'A36%' then '09' else case when g.maicd like 'A37%' then '10' else case when g.maicd like 'B01%' then '11' else '12' end end end end end end end end end end end

Table.sql: select case when g.maicd like 'A91%' then '01' else case when g.maicd='A83.0' then '02' else case when g.maicd='A86' or g.maicd like 'A87%' or g.maicd like 'G04%' then '03' else case when g.maicd like 'B05%' then '04' else case when g.maicd like 'B50%' or g.maicd like 'B51%' or g.maicd like 'B54%' or g.maicd like 'B52%' then '05' else case when g.maicd like 'B34%' then '06' else case when g.maicd like 'J%' then '07' else case when g.maicd like 'B26%' then '08' else case when g.maicd like 'A36%' then '09' else case when g.maicd like 'A37%' then '10' else case when g.maicd like 'B01%' then '11' else '12' end end end end end end end end end end end stt,a.MABN, a.HOTEN,substr(i.tuoivao,1,3)||case when substr(i.tuoivao,4,1)=0 then 'TU' else case when substr(i.tuoivao,4,1)=1 then 'TH' else case when substr(i.tuoivao,4,1)=2 then 'NG' else 'GI' end end end as tuoi,nvl(h.quanhe,' ') quanhe,nvl(h.hoten,' ') hotenqh,nvl(a.SONHA,' ') sonha, nvl(a.THON,' ') thon, b.TENPXA, c.TENQUAN, d.TENTT,nvl(y.tenbv,' ') tenbv,to_char(f.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi') ngayvk, g.CHANDOAN, g.MAICD, e.TEN ttlucrk, to_char(g.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi') ngayrk, g.SOLUUTRU,' ' nhom,' ' tennhom FROM his.btdbn a inner join his.benhandt f on a.mabn=f.mabn inner join his.btdpxa b on a.maphuongxa=b.maphuongxa inner join his.btdquan c on a.maqu=c.maqu inner join his.btdtt d on a.matt=d.matt inner join his.xuatvien g on f.maql=g.maql inner join his.ttxk e on g.ttlucrv=e.ma left join his.QUANHE h on f.maql=h.maql inner join his.lienhe i on f.maql=i.maql left join his.noigioithieu x on f.maql=x.maql left join his.dstt y on x.mabv=y.mabv where g.maql>0
Table.cont: (g.maicd like 'A91%' or g.maicd='A83.0' or g.maicd='A86' or g.maicd like 'A87%' or g.maicd like 'G04%' or g.maicd like 'B05%' or g.maicd like 'B50%' or g.maicd like 'B51%' or g.maicd like 'B54%' or g.maicd like 'B52%' or g.maicd like 'B34%' or g.maicd like 'J%' or g.maicd like 'B26%' or g.maicd like 'A36%' or g.maicd like 'A37%' or g.maicd like 'B01%')
Table.stt: case when g.maicd like 'A91%' then '01' else case when g.maicd='A83.0' then '02' else case when g.maicd='A86' or g.maicd like 'A87%' or g.maicd like 'G04%' then '03' else case when g.maicd like 'B05%' then '04' else case when g.maicd like 'B50%' or g.maicd like 'B51%' or g.maicd like 'B54%' or g.maicd like 'B52%' then '05' else case when g.maicd like 'B34%' then '06' else case when g.maicd like 'J%' then '07' else case when g.maicd like 'B26%' then '08' else case when g.maicd like 'A36%' then '09' else case when g.maicd like 'A37%' then '10' else case when g.maicd like 'B01%' then '11' else '12' end end end end end end end end end end end
